string.name: name
string.value: The Beginner Pirate's First Training Session
You're now a Pirate! Now what? Perhaps Kyrin can help you.
Kyrin suggests monster hunting as a form of basic training. She wants you to hunt #r11 Pigs#k. There are apparently a lot of Pigs near Henesys. \n\n#o1210100# #r#a21931##k
You eliminated 11 Pigs and reported the results to Kyrin. No sweat!
해적이란 직업이 아직 어색하지? 경험이 없으니 당연한거야. 경험이야 말로 정말 중요한 거라구. 아직 혼자서 경험을 쌓기는 힘들거야. 내가 약간 도와줄 수 있는데 수련을 하겠어? \r\n#L0##b 수련을 하겠습니다.#k#l \n#L1##b 스스로의 힘으로 할 수 있습니다.#k#l
스스로의 한계를 인정할 줄 아는 마음이야말로, 더 강해지기 위한 바탕이 되지. 네가 강한 해적이 되도록 도와주겠어.

Is the whole Pirate job still foreign to you? That's because you don't have much experience as one. Right now, it may be a bit tough for you to gain experience on your own. I can help you a bit with that. Do you want to train with me? \r\n#L0##b Yes I will.#k#l \n#L1##b I can do it by myself.#k#l
The moment you accept your limitations, you are ready to break that barrier and go further than that. I'll make sure you'll become a more powerful Pirate than when you first walked in.
Maybe you're not ready to train yet...

Still not used to using a Knuckler or a Gun? Try hunting the pigs first to get acclimated to the Pirates' way of hunting. Try hunting #r11 pigs#k first. The pigs can be easily found at the harbor of The Nautilus, so that should be easy. You can even find some nearby at Henesys.
Maybe you're not ready to train yet...
Great job slaying 11 pigs. This is only the beginning, though. You've only taken a baby step towards the mastery of Pirate.
I'll let you know when I see that you'll need another set of training. In the mean time, keep training... and hopefully I'll see a different you the next time up.
I don't think you have slayed all #r11 pigs#k yet. If you want to become stronger, you'll need to put in the effort to do so.
